title: Over 70% of Gen Z and Millennials prefer values-aligned brands per NielsenIQ
statement: A NielsenIQ study found over 70% of Gen Z and Millennials are more likely to purchase from brands reflecting their values.

citations.quote: A recent NielsenIQ study also found that over 70% of Gen Z and Millennials are more likely to buy from brands that reflect their social or environmental values.
